title: Broadsheet Case – Official Documents – High Court Decision
content:
Original documents related to the Broadsheet case, released on the instructions of Prime Minister Imran Khan for the general public.
Minister for Interior Sheikh Rashid Tuesday said the Broadsheet case would prove to be Panama 2 for the PML- N leaders.
THE HIGH COURT OF JUSTICE BUSINESS AND PROPERTY COURTS OF ENGLAND AND WALES COMMERCIAL COURT (QBD) – APPROVED JUDGEMENT
